description: Serangan dengan senjata Utama
name: Basic Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.
<setup action>
display action
hide battle hud

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20

 camera offset: right, 50


else

camera focus: user
zoom: 110%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 110%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

end

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: target, front, 20
wait for movement
else
  perform start
move user: target, front base, 20, auto offset x -800
wait for movement
end


wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
wait for animation

action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5

CLEAR BATTLE LOG
show battle hud
</target action>

description: Tidak ada pilihan lain selain bertahan
name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.
<target action>
MOTION GUARD: target
wait for animation
</target action>

description: Serangan ganda 2x terhadap single target enemy
name: Dual Attack
note:
<Cooldown: 3>
<setup action>
display action
hide battle hud
wait: 30
opacity not focus: 0%
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>
zoom: 150%, 15
camera focus: user, center, 15
wait for camera

animation 51: user
motion chant: user
wait for animation
motion guard: user

wait: 20
jump user: 80%
move user: target, front base, 15
wait for movement
motion swing: user
action animation 24: target
action effect
wait: 10

move user: target, back base, 15
wait for movement
move user: target, front base, 15
jump user: 80%
wait for movement
action effect
wait for movement
motion dying: target

perform finish
wait for animation
opacity not focus: 100%
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
show battle hud
</target action>

description: Serangan berefek Api
name: Firefull Smite
note:
<setup action>

display action

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'

camera focus: target
zoom: 150%, 20

 camera offset: right, 50


else

camera focus: user
zoom: 110%, 20
wait: 20
camera focus: target
zoom: 110%, 20
 camera offset: right, 50

end

immortal: targets, true
</setup action>

<target action>

if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
  move user: targets, front, 20
else
  perform start
end


wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
animation 13: target
wait for animation
action effect

wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5
wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
animation 13: target
wait for animation
action effect

wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5

wait for movement
motion attack: user
wait: 10
attack animation: target
animation 13: target
wait for animation

action effect
wait for animation
wait for movement
wait: 5
perform finish
immortal: targets, false
wait for movement
CLEAR BATTLE LOG
</target action>
